General.Name: Yunsa Yunlu Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Yünsa Yünlü Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures wool fabric products in Turkey. The company operates through Textile and Apparel segments. It offers wool and blended fabrics, which include men's woolen and worsted, trousers, and jackets fabrics; women's, fashion trend and clothing fabrics; corporate wear fabrics; and upholstery fabrics primarily used in commercial vehicle industry. The company also exports its products to approximately 50 countries. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey. Yünsa Yünlü Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. operates as a subsidiary of Sürmegöz Tekstil Yatirim A.S.
